"Can I suggest something that doesn't involve violence, or is this the wrong crowd for that?"
"We'll get off.  River and I will get off and..."
"Nobody's saying that."
"Nobody besides Jayne is saying that."
"Shepherd... don't move."
"Won't go far."
"I shot him down... I killed the ship... that killed us.  Not very  Christian of me."
"You did what's right."
"...coming from you, that means... almost nothing."
"Shouldn't have been you - they shoulda hit us."
"That crossed my mind..."

"Runtse duh shang-dee, ching daiwuhtzo [Merciful God, please take me away].  Make them stop, they're everywhere, every city every house every room, they're all inside me.  I can hear them all and they're saying nothing!  GET UP!  PLEASE GET THEM UP!  Wuoshang mayer, maysheen, byen shr-too [I will  close my ears and my heart and I will be a stone], please God, make me a stone!"
"She is starting to damage my calm."
"Tzao ss-ma?  Nee-yow wuh-kai chang?" [You wanna bullet?  You wanna bullet right in the throat?]
"Runtse de fwotzoo, ching baoyo wuomun..." [Oh merciful Buddha, protect us...]
"Juhguh jee hua jun kuhpah!" [This plan is horrific.]
"It's of interest to me how much you know about that world."
"I wasn't born a Shepherd, Mal."
"Have to tell me about that sometime."
"No, I don't."
"And we're gonna need paint.  We're going to need red paint."
"Sir.  Do you really mean to turn our home into an abomination  so we can make a suicidal attempt at passing through Reaver space?"
"I mean to live.  I mean for us to live.  The Alliance won't have that, so we go where they won't follow."
"How much ammo is left?"
"Three mags and my swinging cod!"
"River - I'm sorry..."
"No.  No."
"I hate to... leave..."
"You won't.  You take care of me.  You've always taken care of me."  (pause)  "My turn."
"The Alliance knows about Mr. Universe.  They're gonna see this coming."
"No.  They're not going to see this coming."
"Target the reavers.  Target the reavers!  Target everything!   Somebody, fire!!!"
"My one true regret in all this is never being with you."
"With me?  You mean to say, as... sex?"
"... I mean to say."
"Hell with this!  I'm gonna live!"
"It's finished.  We're finished."
"They can't stop the signal, Mal.  They can never stop the  signal."
"Mal?  Guy killed me, Mal.  He killed me with a sword.  How weird is that?"

dialog.person: Mal (looking at the transmitter past a fall to certain doom)
dialog.text: "'Hard to get to'?!  That's a fact!"
"Are you willing to die for that belief?"
(beat) "Yes."  (He and the Operative draw on each other.  Mal fires first, disarming the Operative.)  " 'Course, that ain't exactly plan A."
"That's what you want, isn't it?"
"I don't know."
"Good answer."
"Do you know what your sin is?
"Aw hell, I'm a big fan of all seven... but right now, I'm gonna have to go with wrath."
"I am a leaf on the wind.  Watch how I soar."
"I ain't gonna kill you.  Hell, I'm gonna grant your greatest wish.   I'm gonna show you a world without sin."

"Ok, clearly some aptitude for this, but it ain't all buttons and charts, little albatross. You know what the first rule of flying is? Well, I suppose you do, since you already know what I'm about to say. "
"I do. But I like to hear you say it."

"Love. You can learn all the math in the 'verse, but you take a boat into the air you don't love, she'll shake you off just as sure as the turning of worlds. Love keeps her in the air when she oughta fall down, tells you she's hurting 'fore she keens. Makes her a home."
"Storm's getting worse."
"We'll pass through it soon enough."
"When your quarry goes to ground, leave no ground to go to."
"Half of writing history is hiding the truth."
"She's tore up plenty.  But she'll fly true."
"Go hwong-tong [Enough of this nonsense].  No trouble now, little  crazy person...  we're going for a nice shuttle ride..."
"Keep on talking... You're not getting a location trace off this wave..."
"I can't shut them up, they're all made up of rage..."
"Zoe?  Are you here?"
"Do the job, sir." Mal.  You hold.  Hold till I'm back."
"You should know there's no shame in this.  You've done remarkable  things.  But you're fighting a war you've already lost."
"Yeah, I'm known for that."
"I don't plan on any shooting taking place during this job."
"Well, what you plan and what takes place ain't ever exactly been  similar."
"Just get us on the ground!"
"That part'll happen, pretty definitely."
"You're unpredictable, Mal... you run when you oughtta fight,  fight when you oughtta deal.  Makes a business person twitchy..."
"Show me off like a dog, old men covered in blood, it never  touched them but they're drowning in it... I don't know what I'm  saying, I never know what I'm saying..."
"We locked on to Serenity's pulse beacon the moment you  hit atmo.  I can speak a word and send a missile to that exact location  inside of three minutes."
"You do that, best make peace with your dear and fluffy lord." (tosses a gadget to the Operative)
"... pulse beacon..."
"Piece of shrapnel tore up that nerve cluster my first tour.  Had it moved."
"Miranda."
"What was that?"
"I, uh, better go see how the inevitable mutiny is coming along..."
"...so why would [the independents] fight so hard against us?"
"We meddle."
"River?"
"People don't like to be meddled with.  We tell them what to do,  what to think, don't run don't walk we're in their homes and in their heads  and we haven't the right.  We're meddlesome."
"River, we're not telling people what to think.  We're just trying  to show them how."
"All our subjects are conditioned for combat, but River...  she's a creature of extraordinary grace."
"Yes.  She always did love to dance."
"We're making a better world.  All of them, better worlds."
"Nobody flies like my mister."
"I bring River all the way out to the raggedy edge of the 'verse  so she can hide from the Alliance by robbing banks."
"I know the cap'n'll look out for her.  They'll be back before you  can spit." (beat)  "Not that you spit."
"How come they ain't blowin' us out of the air?"
"They wanna run us down.  The up close kill."
"They want us alive when they eat us."

dialog.person: Screen in a bar, advertising candy
dialog.text: "Not Mandatory"
There's mandatory candy?]
"Hello, little one.  You know your part in this?"
(beat) "Do you?"
"It's what I do, darlin'."  (sighing) "It's what I do."
"Ready to go to work, darlin'?"
"There's no pattern to the pebbles here.  Completely random.  "I tried to count them, but you drove too fast.  Hummingbird.
"Alright.  Great.  Lets go."
"All the more reason the girls look to you.  You've seen so much. You're a figure of great romance to them."
"Great romance has nothing to do with being a companion, Sheydra; you should know better."
(coyly) "I'm not the one who had a torrid affair with a pirate."
(shocked) "A who?  With a what?"
"It's the talk of the house.  The girls all trade stories in the dorms at night."
"I... didn't... have a... pirate!"
"In one of the stories, you make love in a burning temple.  I think that's my favorite."

"Lord - I'm walking your way.  Let me in, for my feet are sore.  My clothes are ragged.  Look in my eyes, Lord, and my sins will play out in them as on the screen.  Read them off.  Forgive what you can, and send me on my path.  I will walk on until you give me rest."
"You won't." (pause) "There is nothing left to see." (Operative walks off, then stops near the engine, looking up at the ship through the rain)
"Serenity.  You lost everything in that battle.  Everything you had, everything you were.  How did you go on?"
"You're still standing there when that engine starts, you never will figure it out." (walks into Serenity)  "What a whiner!"
(to Wash, lovingly) "That was close."  (They hug each other playfully)
"Hey, what are you guys doin?" (beat) "Making out?"
(flips off Mal) "Blow it, captain."
"Whoa, Whoa, you see that?  You see it, right?  You see that?"
"Turn?  Would you turn?"
"You want to fly this thing?"
"You want me... would you pull over?  Is that what you call what you're doing?"
"I will pull over this spaceship right now!"
"Christ almighty!"
"Dammit, I don't need a back spaceship driver!"
"Get out of the way!!!"
"Christ, that's it!" (throws up hands, leaves seat) "You wanna fly, f'in fly!" (off set) "I'll be in my bunk."
"Summer!"
It was a running joke on-set that whenever anything went wrong, it was actress Summer Glau (River)'s fault.]
"TRAAAAAAAAAAPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!"
"Don't f'in tell me what to goddamn do!"
(laughing) "Goddamn do?"
"Get these bodies together!"
"We got time for gravedigging?"
"Zoe, take this and rope them together; five or six of them, I want them laid out on the nose of our ship."
"Are you insane?"

"Put Book front and center.  He's our friend; we should honor him.  Kaylee!  Find that kid who's taking a dirt nap with Baby Jesus; we need a hood ornament.  Jayne!  Try not to steal too much of their shit."
